attributes.action: step aside as Prime Minister for Harriet Harman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to call on Mr Brown to stand down as Prime Minister and hand over to his deputy Harriet Harman. Mr Brown although a good man and a good chancellor, for the good of the country he must go from number 10 and allowing Ms Harman to takeover and rescue the country from an Eton clique from ever getting into office.
